Verses: 1 karththar Aasarippuk Koodaaraththilirundhu Moseyaikkooppittu, Avanai Nokki:

2 nee Isravel Puththiraridaththil Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal, Ungalil Oruvan Karththarukkup Paliseluththa Vandhaal, Maattumandhaiyilaavadhu, Aattumandhaiyilaavadhu Oru Mirugaththaith Therindheduththu, Paliseluththavendum.

3 avan Seluththuvadhu Maattumandhaiyilirundhu Edukkappatta Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaanaal, Avan Pazhudhatra Oru Kaalaiyai Seluththuvaanaaga; Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Thaan Angigarikkappadumpadi, Avan Adhai Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalil Konduvandhu,
4 adhu Than Paavanivirththikkendru Angigarikkappadumpadi Than Kaiyai Adhin Thalaiyinmel Vaiththu,

5 karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Andhak Kaalaiyaik Kollakkadavan; Appozhudhu Aaronin Kumaararaagiya Aasaariyargal Adhin Raththaththai Eduththu, Adhai Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalil Irukkira Palipeedaththinmel Sutrilum Thelikkakkadavargal.
6 pinbu Avan Andha Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaith Tholuriththu, Adhai Sandhusandhaagath Thundikkakkadavan.
7 appozhudhu Aasaariyanaagiya Aaronin Kumaarar Palipeedaththinmel Akkiniyaippottu, Akkiniyinmel Kattaigalai Adukki,
8 avan Kumaararaagiya Aasaariyargal, Thundangalaiyum Thalaiyaiyum Kozhuppaiyum Palipeedaththilulla Akkiniyil Irukkira Kattaigalinmel Adukkivaikkakkadavargal.

9 adhin Kudalgalaiyum Thodaigalaiyum Avan Thanneerinaal Kazhuvuvaanaaga; Avaigalaiyellaam Aasaariyan Palipeedaththinmel Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaagath Thaganikkakkadavan; Idhu Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Thaganapali.
10 avan Seluththuvadhu Semmariyaattu Mandhaiyilulla Aadugalilaavadhu Vellaattu Mandhaiyilulla Aadugalilaavadhu Edukkappatta Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaanaal, Pazhudhatra Oru Kadaavaik Konduvandhu,

11 karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Palipeedaththin Vadapuraththil Adhaik Kollakkadavan; Appozhudhu Aaronin Kumaararaagiya Aasaariyargal Adhin Raththaththaip Palipeedaththinmel Sutrilum Thelikkakkadavargal.
12 pinbu Avan Adhai Sandhusandhaagath Thundiththu, Adhin Thalaiyaiyum Kozhuppaiyum Koodavaippaanaaga; Avaigalai Aasaariyan Palipeedaththilulla Akkiniyil Irukkira Kattaigalinmel Adukkivaikkakkadavan.

13 kudalgalaiyum Thodaigalaiyum Avan Thanneerinaal Kazhuvuvaanaaga; Avaigalaiyellaam Aasaariyan Konduvandhu Palipeedaththinmel Thaganikkakkadavan; Idhu Sarvaanga Thaganapali; Idhu Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Thaganapali.
14 avan Karththarukku Seluththuvadhu Paravaigalilirundhu Edukkappatta Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaanaal, Kaattuppuraakkalilaavadhu Puraakkunjugalilaavadhu Eduththu Seluththakkadavan.
15 adhai Aasaariyan Palipeedaththandaiyil Konduvandhu, Adhin Thalaiyaik Killi, Palipeedaththil Thaganiththu, Adhin Raththaththaip Palipeedaththin Pakkaththil Sindhavittu,
16 adhin Iraippaiyai Adhin Malaththodunkooda Eduththu, Adhaip Palipeedaththandaiyil Keezhppuramaaga Saambal Irukkira Idaththile Erindhuvittu,

17 pinbu Adhin Settaigaludan Adhai Irandaakkaamal Pilappaanaaga; Pinbu Aasaariyan Adhaip Palipeedaththilulla Akkiniyil Irukkira Kattaigalinmel Thaganikkakkadavan; Idhu Sarvaanga Thaganapali; Idhu Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Thaganapali.
